name: love-notes
description: LoveNotes is a heartwarming web application that lets you craft personalized messages for your beloved ones on special occasions. Whether it's a birthday, anniversary, or just a heartfelt expression of love, LoveNotes makes it easy to create and send meaningful messages via email. Say it with sincerity and emotion, and let LoveNotes help you touch the hearts of those you cherish most.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
